 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
Supplier, not Kraft or the Eligible Recipients, has the right, power, authority and duty to supervise and direct the activities of the Supplier Personnel, to compensate such Supplier Personnel
for any work performed by them on the behalf of Kraft or the Eligible Recipients pursuant to this Agreement, and to terminate Supplier&#146;s employment of such personnel. Supplier, and not Kraft or the Eligible Recipients, shall be responsible and
therefore solely liable for all acts and omissions of Supplier Personnel acting in the course of their employment, including acts or omissions constituting negligence, gross negligence, willful misconduct and/or fraud. </FONT></P>

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>8.8.1</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Sufficiency and Suitability of Personnel</B>. Supplier shall assign (or cause to be assigned) sufficient Supplier Personnel to provide the Services in accordance
with this Agreement and such Supplier Personnel shall possess suitable competence, ability and qualifications and shall be properly educated and trained for the Services they are to perform. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>8.8.2</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Requested Replacement</B>. In the event that Kraft determines lawfully and in good faith that the continued assignment to Kraft of any individual Supplier Personnel
(including Key Supplier Personnel) is not in the best interests of Kraft or the Eligible Recipients, then Kraft shall give Supplier notice to that effect requesting that such Supplier Personnel be replaced. Supplier shall have 10 business days
following Kraft&#146;s request for removal of such Supplier Personnel in which to investigate the matters forming the basis of such request, correct any deficient performance and provide Kraft with assurances that such deficient performance shall
not recur (provided that, if requested to do so, Supplier shall immediately remove (or cause to be removed) the individual in question from all Kraft sites pending completion of Supplier&#146;s investigation and discussions with Kraft). If,
following such 10 business day period, Kraft is not reasonably satisfied with the results of Supplier&#146;s efforts to correct the deficient performance and/or to ensure its non-recurrence, Supplier shall, as soon as possible, remove and replace
such Supplier Personnel with an individual of suitable ability and qualifications, without cost to Kraft. Nothing in this provision shall operate or be construed to limit Supplier&#146;s responsibility for the acts or omission of the Supplier
Personnel, or be construed as joint employment. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>8.8.3</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Turnover Rate and Data</B>. Supplier will use commercially reasonable efforts to keep the turnover rate of personnel performing the Services to a level comparable or
better than averages for large, well-managed first tier service providers performing similar services, and in any case as necessary to comply with the applicable Service Levels. If Kraft determines that the turnover rate of Supplier Personnel is
higher than that noted above or otherwise has an adverse effect on Kraft, and so notifies Supplier, Supplier shall within 30 days (i)&nbsp;provide Kraft with data concerning Supplier&#146;s turnover rate, (ii)&nbsp;meet with Kraft to discuss the
reasons for the turnover rate, and (iii)&nbsp;submit a proposal for reducing the turnover rate for Kraft&#146;s review and approval. Notwithstanding any transfer or turnover of Supplier Personnel, Supplier shall remain obligated to perform the
Services without degradation and in accordance with the Service Levels. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

Transitioned Personnel; Transitioned Personnel who are SAP basis programmers or database administrators; Critical Affected Personnel, other than contractors; or Key Supplier Personnel (who remain employed by Supplier or a Subcontractor) to perform
services directly or indirectly for or market Supplier&#146;s services to a Direct Kraft Competitor either while engaged in the provision of Services or during the first [ * * * ] after the Effective Date for the Transitioned Employees and, with
respect to: (a)&nbsp;each Key </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Supplier Personnel</B>. Supplier shall comply with applicable Laws with respect to verifying the authorization of Supplier Personnel to work in any country in which
they are assigned to perform Services. To the extent allowed by applicable laws and to the extent of consistency with market practice, for newly-hired Supplier employees (which does not include Transitioned Employees), Supplier shall perform or have
performed a background check, drug test and credit test on all Supplier Personnel assigned to work hereunder, provided that, if a satisfactory background check was completed in connection with the hiring of such Supplier Personnel, it need not be
repeated. Supplier Personnel who do not meet Supplier&#146;s hiring criteria shall not be assigned to work hereunder. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:18px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Conduct of Supplier Personnel. </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>8.9.1</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Conduct and Compliance</B>. While at Kraft Sites or Kraft Facilities, Supplier Personnel shall (i)&nbsp;comply with the Kraft Rules and other rules and regulations
regarding personal and professional conduct, including Kraft Labor Policies listed in <B><U>Schedule 17.5</U></B>, generally applicable to personnel at such Kraft Sites (and communicated to Supplier in writing or by any other means generally used by
Kraft to disseminate such information to its employees or contractors), (ii)&nbsp;comply with reasonable requests of Kraft or the Eligible Recipients personnel pertaining to personal and professional conduct, (iii)&nbsp;attend workplace training
offered by Kraft and/or the Eligible Recipients at Kraft&#146;s request, and (iv)&nbsp;otherwise conduct themselves in a businesslike and professional manner. Provided Supplier has received reasonable notice from Kraft, Supplier shall ensure that
any Supplier Personnel who provide Services at the applicable Kraft Site shall have passed background screening and drug testing to the extent such screening or testing is generally required of third party service providers performing work in such
Kraft Sites for comparable periods of time, provided such requirement is permitted by applicable Law. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>8.9.2</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Identification of Supplier Personnel</B>. All Supplier Personnel shall clearly identify themselves as Supplier Personnel and not as employees of Kraft and/or the
Eligible Recipients. This shall include any and all communications, whether oral, written or electronic. Each Supplier Personnel shall wear a badge indicating that he or she is employed by Supplier or its Subcontractors when at a Kraft Site or
Facility. Supplier personnel will be required to display a Kraft badge while at a Kraft Facility or Kraft Site, such badge will be clearly marked with the words &#147;Contractor,&#148; on the front of the badge in an offsetting color to the badge
background, to indicate that the Supplier personnel are not employees of Kraft or an Eligible Recipient. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>8.9.3</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Restriction on Marketing Activity</B>. Except for marketing representatives designated in writing by Supplier to Kraft, none of the Supplier Personnel shall conduct
any marketing activities to Kraft or Eligible Recipient employees at Kraft Facilities or sites (including marketing of any New Services), other than, subject to <B><U>Section&nbsp;13.3</U></B>, reporting potential marketing opportunities to
Supplier&#146;s designated marketing representatives. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>8.10</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Substance Abuse. </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>8.10.1</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Employee Removal</B>. To the extent permitted by applicable Laws, Supplier shall immediately remove (or cause to be removed) any Supplier Personnel who is known to
be or reasonably suspected of engaging in substance abuse while at Kraft Facility or Site, in a Kraft vehicle or while performing Services. In the case of reasonable suspicion, such removal shall be pending completion of the applicable
investigation. Substance abuse includes the sale, attempted sale, possession or use of illegal drugs, drug paraphernalia, or, to the extent not permitted on at Kraft Facilities or Kraft Sites, alcohol, or the misuse of prescription or
non-prescription drugs. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>8.10.2</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Substance Abuse Policy</B>. Supplier represents and warrants that it has and will maintain substance abuse policies, in each case in conformance with applicable
Laws, and Supplier Personnel will be subject to such policies. Supplier represents and warrants that it shall require its Subcontractors (other than Commodity Equipment and Transport Providers, product vendor specialists who Supplier engages on a
temporary basis to address urgent problems, and Third Party Contractors under Third Party Contracts assumed by Supplier to the extent such contracts do not comply with this requirement as of the Effective Date) and Affiliates providing Services to
have and maintain such policy in conformance with applicable Law and to adhere to this provision. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:18px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>8.11</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Union Agreements and WARN ACT. </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>8.11.1</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Notice by Supplier</B>. Supplier shall provide Kraft not less than 90 days notice of the expiration of any collective agreement with unionized Supplier Personnel if
the expiration of such agreement or any resulting labor dispute could potentially interfere with or disrupt the business or operations of Kraft or an Eligible Recipient or impact Supplier&#146;s ability to timely perform its duties and obligations
under this Agreement. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>8.11.2</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>WARN Act Commitment</B>. Supplier shall not, for a period of 90 days after the Commencement Date, cause any of the Transitioned Employees who were located at
Kraft&#146;s Bannockburn facility prior to their Employment Effective Date to suffer &#147;employment loss&#148; as that term is construed under the Worker Adjustment and Retraining Notification Act (&#147;<B>WARN Act</B>&#148;), if such employment
loss could create any liability for Kraft, the Eligible Recipients, or any of their respective Affiliates, under the WARN Act with respect to Kraft&#146;s Bannockburn facility, unless Supplier delivers notices under the WARN Act in a manner and at a
time such that Kraft, the Eligible Recipients or their respective Affiliates bear no liability with respect thereto. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>8.11.3</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Responsibility</B>. Supplier shall be responsible for any liability, cost, claim, expense, obligation or sanction attributable to any breach by Supplier of
<B><U>Section&nbsp;8.11.2</U></B> that results in Kraft or the Eligible Recipients being in violation of the WARN Act or the regulations promulgated thereunder with respect to Kraft&#146;s Bannockburn facility. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">53 </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT HAS BEEN REQUESTED FOR PORTIONS OF THIS EXHIBIT. THE COPY FILED HEREWITH OMITS THE INFORMATION SUBJECT TO A
CONFIDENTIALITY REQUEST. OMISSIONS ARE DESIGNATED [ * * * ]. A COMPLETE VERSION OF THIS EXHIBIT HAS BEEN FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION. </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>8.12</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Application of Acquired Rights Directive and Similar Laws.</B> Each Party agrees to comply fully with its legal obligations under the EU Acquired Rights Directive
and similar applicable Laws if and where applicable to the transfer of Affected Personnel to Supplier&#146;s or Supplier&#146;s Affiliate&#146;s employment, including (without limitation) its obligations regarding consultation and the giving of
information. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:18px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>8.13</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Reserved. </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>8.14</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Directed Employees</B>. Kraft shall make available to Supplier for use in Supplier&#146;s performance of Services the employees of Kraft and its Affiliates listed on
the applicable Supplement (so long as they remain employees with Kraft or its Affiliates and are not unavailable due to reasons beyond Kraft&#146;s reasonable control) for the period commencing on the Commencement Date and extending through the date
specified for each such employee on the applicable Supplement (such period with respect to each such employee, the &#147;<B>Directed Employee Period</B>&#148; and each such employee during such respective period, a &#147;<B>Directed
Employee</B>&#148;). Supplier shall provide direction to Kraft management personnel who will instruct Directed Employees to perform activities in connection with Supplier&#146;s performance of the Services in a manner consistent with the technical
direction provided by Supplier. Supplier shall not have authority to fire, impose discipline or otherwise to take personnel related actions with respect to the Directed Employees. The Parties agree that no employer and employee relationship is to be
created between Supplier and the Directed Employees, and that no co-employment relationship is created nor is intended to be created, and further that no employee benefits available to employees of Supplier shall accrue to the Directed Employees
during the period such employees are employed by Kraft or its Affiliates. Supplier will at all times exercise its right to provide Kraft management with technical direction regarding the activities of the Directed Employee in accordance with
Kraft&#146;s policies, and in consultation, as necessary, with the Kraft Contract Manager or his/her designee. In respect of the Directed Employees, Supplier shall not be responsible for implementing and administering Kraft human resources policies,
practices or procedures, including without limitation those addressing hiring, compensation, promotions, transfers, terminations, employment related complaints, or general career development and performance management. Deficient performance by any
Directed Employee while performing a function under Supplier&#146;s direction shall not constitute a failure by Kraft to perform any of its obligations under this Agreement, and, except as provided in the last sentence of this
<B><U>Section&nbsp;8.14</U></B>, shall not excuse Supplier from any of its obligations under this Agreement. Other terms applicable to the Directed Employees shall otherwise be as provided in the applicable Supplement. Supplier shall be excused for
a Directed Employee&#146;s failure to perform as directed by Supplier if Supplier has notified Kraft in writing of such failure and Kraft has not thereafter caused the Directed Employee to promptly correct such failure. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:18px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>9.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>SUPPLIER RESPONSIBILITIES. </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>9.1</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Policy and Procedures Manual. </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>9.1.1</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Content</B>. As part of the Services, and at no additional cost, Supplier shall provide to Kraft and the Eligible Recipients a manual describing the policies and
procedures that will govern the provision of the Services, including the content required by <B><U>Schedule 21.1</U></B> and those policies and procedures of Kraft and the Eligible Recipients that Kraft may designate from time to time (the
&#147;<B>Policy and Procedures Manual</B>&#148;). </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>9.1.2</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Updated Policy and Procedures Manual. </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>

<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">9.1.2.1</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Existing Services</B>. In connection with each Supplement for Services being performed by Supplier immediately preceding the applicable Supplement Effective Date,
and at no additional cost to Kraft, Supplier shall develop and deliver to Kraft for its review, comment and approval (i)&nbsp;a reasonably complete draft of an updated Policy and Procedures Manual applicable to the Services under this Agreement
containing additions and modifications applicable to and/or specified in such Supplement not later than thirty (30)&nbsp;days after the Supplement Effective Date, and (ii)&nbsp;a final draft of such updated Policy and Procedures Manual within sixty
(60)&nbsp;days after the Supplement Effective Date. Kraft shall review the draft Policy and Procedures Manual and provide Supplier with comments and revisions. Supplier shall then incorporate any comments or suggestions of Kraft into the Policy and
Procedures Manual and shall deliver a final revised version to Kraft within fifteen (15)&nbsp;business days of its receipt of such comments and suggestions for Kraft&#146;s approval. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

Effective Date, and at no additional cost to Kraft: </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

Manual within 30 days after the applicable Supplement Effective Date. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="17%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="11%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">9.1.2.2.2</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Content Required Prior to the Commencement Date</B>. Supplier shall deliver the updated portions of the Policy and Procedures Manual that are required to be
completed prior to the applicable Supplement Commencement Date (including content identified as such in the applicable Supplement) at least 30 days prior to the applicable Supplement Commencement Date. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Content Required Following the Commencement Date</B>. Supplier shall deliver the complete Policy and Procedures Manual as soon as practicable but in any case no
later than ninety (90)&nbsp;<B><I>/</I></B>days after the applicable Supplement Commencement Date. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Kraft Review and Comments</B>. Supplier shall make any changes reasonably requested by Kraft with respect to the Materials delivered pursuant to this
<B><U>Section&nbsp;9.1.2.2</U></B> within 15 business days after receipt from Kraft, and shall resubmit such Materials for Kraft&#146;s further review and approval. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>9.1.3</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Revision and Maintenance.</B> The Policy and Procedures Manual will be delivered and maintained by Supplier in hard copy and electronic formats and will be
accessible electronically to Kraft management and Authorized Users in a manner consistent with Kraft&#146;s security policies. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Compliance</B>. Subject to Supplier&#146;s responsibilities in <B><U>Sections 9.4</U></B> and <B><U>9.10.9</U></B>, Supplier shall keep its records
related to each Supplement in accordance with GAAP, and perform the applicable Services in accordance with Kraft's requirements related to the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002 as set forth in the applicable Supplement or <B><U>Schedule 17.4</U></B>, or
otherwise provided in writing </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
by Kraft, and any and all applicable Laws and Kraft&#146;s then current policies and procedures applicable to Kraft in connection with this Agreement until the Policy and Procedures Manual is
finalized and agreed upon by the Parties. Thereafter, Supplier shall perform the Services in accordance with the Policy and Procedures Manual. In the event of a conflict between the provisions of this Agreement and the Policy and Procedures Manual,
the provisions of this Agreement shall control unless the Parties expressly agree otherwise and such agreement is set forth in the relevant portion of the Policy and Procedures Manual. Without limiting Supplier&#146;s obligations under this
<B><U>Section&nbsp;9.1.4</U></B> and <B><U>Sections 9.4</U></B> and <B><U>9.10.9</U></B>, Kraft acknowledges and agrees that it retains responsibility for its compliance with GAAP and the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>9.1.5</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Modification and Updating</B>. Supplier shall promptly modify and update the Policy and Procedures Manual monthly to reflect changes in the operations or procedures
described therein, to reflect new Supplements or other changes in the work to be performed, and to comply with Kraft Standards, the Technology Plan and Strategic Plans as described in <B><U>Section&nbsp;9.5</U></B>. Supplier shall provide the
proposed changes in the manual to Kraft for review, comment and approval. To the extent such change could (i)&nbsp;increase Kraft&#146;s total costs of receiving the Services; (ii)&nbsp;require material changes to the facilities, systems, software
or equipment of Kraft and/or the Eligible Recipients; (iii)&nbsp;have an adverse impact on the functionality, interoperability, performance, accuracy, speed, responsiveness, quality or resource efficiency of the Services, or (iv)&nbsp;violate or be
inconsistent with the Kraft Standards, the Technology Plan or Strategic Plans, Supplier shall not implement such change without first obtaining Kraft&#146;s approval, which Kraft may withhold in its sole discretion. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>9.1.6</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Annual Review</B>. The Parties shall meet to perform a formal annual review of the Policy and Procedures Manual on each anniversary of the Commencement Date.
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:18px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>9.2</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Reports. </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>9.2.1</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Reports</B>. Supplier shall provide Kraft with reports pertaining to the performance of the Services and Supplier&#146;s other obligations under this Agreement
sufficient to permit Kraft to monitor and manage Supplier&#146;s performance (&#147;<B>Reports</B>&#148;). The Reports to be provided by Supplier shall include those described in the applicable Supplement in the format and at the frequencies
provided therein, as well as those reports provided by Kraft prior to the Commencement Date for the Snack Business and those that can be provided through ad hoc reporting capabilities in report-generating tools. In addition, from time to time, Kraft
may identify additional Reports to be generated by Supplier and delivered to Kraft on an ad hoc or periodic basis. All Reports listed on the applicable Supplement shall be provided to Kraft as part of the Services and at no additional charge to
Kraft. If Supplier can generate such additional reports using Supplier Personnel, Systems and Software then-assigned to provide the Services without degradation of Services or Service Levels, Supplier will do so at no additional charge. The Reports
described in the applicable Supplement and, to the extent reasonably possible, all other Reports shall be provided to Kraft (i)&nbsp;by secure on-line connection in an electronic format capable of being accessed by Microsoft Office components and
downloadable by Kraft, with the information contained therein capable of being displayed graphically and accessible from a web browser, and (ii)&nbsp;in traditional printed form. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>9.2.2</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Back-Up Documentation</B>. As part of the Services, Supplier shall provide Kraft with such documentation and other information available to Supplier
as may be reasonably requested by Kraft from time to time in order to verify the accuracy of the Reports provided by Supplier. In </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">56 </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT HAS BEEN REQUESTED FOR PORTIONS OF THIS EXHIBIT. THE COPY FILED HEREWITH OMITS THE INFORMATION SUBJECT TO A
CONFIDENTIALITY REQUEST. OMISSIONS ARE DESIGNATED [ * * * ]. A COMPLETE VERSION OF THIS EXHIBIT HAS BEEN FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION. </FONT></P>

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Correction of Errors</B>. As part of the Services, Supplier shall promptly correct any errors or inaccuracies in or with respect to the Reports, the information or
data contained in such Reports, or other contract deliverables. Corrections will be done at no additional charge where the error or inaccuracy was caused by Supplier or its agents, or Subcontractor&#146;s failure to perform its obligations in
accordance with this Agreement, or by Managed Third Parties subject to <B><U>Section&nbsp;6.6</U></B>. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:18px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Governance Model; Meetings. </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>9.3.1</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Governance Model</B>. The Parties shall manage their relationship under this Agreement using the governance model in <B><U>Schedule 6</U></B>.
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>9.3.2</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Meetings</B>. During the Term, representatives of the Parties shall meet periodically or as requested by Kraft to discuss matters arising under this Agreement,
including any such meetings provided for under the Transition Plan described in the applicable Supplement. Each Party shall bear its own costs in connection with the attendance and participation of such Party&#146;s representatives in such meetings.
Such meetings shall include, at a minimum, the following: </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">a periodic meeting at least monthly to review performance and monthly reports, planned or anticipated activities and changes that might impact performance, and such
other matters as appropriate; </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">a quarterly management meeting to review the monthly reports, review Supplier&#146;s overall performance under the Agreement, review progress on the resolution of
issues, provide a strategic outlook for Kraft&#146;s and the Eligible Recipients&#146; information systems requirements, and discuss such other matters as appropriate; </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">a meeting associated with the transition and ongoing provision of the Services, quarterly during the first year of the Term and semi-annually thereafter;
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

provide the Services after the termination or expiration of the Agreement; and </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">such other meetings of Kraft and Supplier Personnel, including senior management of Supplier, as Kraft may reasonably request. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Agenda and Minutes</B>. For each such meeting, upon Kraft request, Supplier shall prepare and distribute an agenda, which will incorporate the
topics designated by Kraft. Supplier shall </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
distribute such agenda in advance of each meeting so that the meeting participants may prepare for the meeting. In addition, upon Kraft request, Supplier shall record and promptly distribute
minutes for every meeting for review and approval by Kraft. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Authorized User and Eligible Recipient Meetings</B>. Supplier shall notify the Kraft Contract Manager in advance of scheduled meetings with Authorized Users or
Eligible Recipients (other than meetings pertaining to the provision of specific Services on a day-to-day basis) and shall invite the Kraft Contract Manager to attend such meetings or to designate a representative to do so. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:18px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>9.4</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Quality Assurance and Internal Controls</B>. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>9.4.1</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B></B>Supplier shall develop and implement Quality Assurance and internal control processes and procedures, including implementing tools and methodologies, to ensure
that the Services are performed in an accurate and timely manner, in accordance with (i)&nbsp;the Service Levels and other requirements of this Agreement, generally accepted practices of first-tier providers within the information technology
industry, (iii)&nbsp;the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002 to the extent of Supplier&#146;s obligations set out in the applicable Supplement<U>,</U> or the requirements in <B><U>Schedule 17.4</U></B> or otherwise provided in writing by Kraft,
(iv)&nbsp;subject to <B><U>Section&nbsp;15.10</U></B>, the Laws applicable to Kraft and the Eligible Recipients, and (vi)&nbsp;industry practice standards applicable to Kraft and the Eligible Recipients and the performance of the Services to the
extent of Supplier&#146;s obligations set out in the applicable Supplement. Such processes, procedures and controls shall include verification, checkpoint reviews, testing, acceptance, and other procedures for Kraft to assure the quality and
timeliness of Supplier&#146;s performance. Without limiting the generality of the foregoing, Supplier will: </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">9.4.1.1</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Maintain a strong control environment in day-to-day operations, to assure that the following fundamental control objectives are met: (i)&nbsp;operational information
and financial information (to the extent required to be provided under this Agreement, including for audit purposes) is valid, complete and accurate; (ii)&nbsp;operations are performed efficiently and achieve effective results, consistent with the
requirements of this Agreement; and (iii)&nbsp;assets are safeguarded; </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">9.4.1.2</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Build the following basic control activities into work processes: (i)&nbsp;accountability clearly defined and understood; (ii)&nbsp;access properly controlled;
(iii)&nbsp;adequate supervision; (iv)&nbsp;transactions properly authorized; (v)&nbsp;transactions properly recorded; (vi)&nbsp;policies, procedures, and responsibilities documented; (vii)&nbsp;adequate training and education; (viii)&nbsp;adequate
separation of duties; and (ix)&nbsp;recorded assets compared with existing assets; </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">9.4.1.3</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Develop and execute a process to ensure periodic control self-assessments are performed with respect to all Services (such self-assessments to be performed at least
annually unless and until Kraft approves less frequent self-assessments); </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">9.4.1.4</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Maintain an internal audit function to sufficiently monitor the processes and Systems used to provide the Services (i.e., perform audits, track control measures,
communicate status to management, drive corrective action, etc.). As part of such internal audit function, Supplier will: </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">58 </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT HAS BEEN REQUESTED FOR PORTIONS OF THIS EXHIBIT. THE COPY FILED HEREWITH OMITS THE INFORMATION SUBJECT TO A
CONFIDENTIALITY REQUEST. OMISSIONS ARE DESIGNATED [ * * * ]. A COMPLETE VERSION OF THIS EXHIBIT HAS BEEN FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION. </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="17%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="11%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">9.4.1.4.1</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Provide to Kraft, promptly after conducting any audit of Supplier&#146;s or its Affiliates&#146; operations relating to the Services, a summary report that
(i)&nbsp;describes the scope of audit, (ii)&nbsp;identifies control weaknesses and any adverse impacts on Kraft&#146;s operations, and (iii)&nbsp;sets forth a plan for remediation for any control weaknesses or adverse impacts that have been
identified. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">9.4.1.5</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Conduct investigations of suspected fraudulent activities within Supplier's organization that impact or could impact Kraft or the Eligible Recipients. Supplier shall
promptly notify Kraft of any such suspected fraudulent activity and the results of any such investigation as they relate to Kraft or the Eligible Recipients. At Supplier&#146;s request, Kraft shall provide reasonable assistance to Supplier in
connection with any such investigation; </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">9.4.1.6</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Comply with all applicable requirements and guidelines set forth in <B><U>Schedule 17.4</U></B>, or otherwise provided in writing by Kraft in order to assist Kraft to
meet the requirements of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002 and implementing regulations promulgated by the United States Securities and Exchange Commission and the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board, as well as similar Laws in other
jurisdictions; </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">9.4.1.7</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Recommend and, with Kraft&#146;s prior approval, implement compliance measures to satisfy Sarbanes-Oxley requirements and similar requirements in other jurisdictions,
including as described in the applicable Supplement and <B><U>Schedule 17.4</U></B>; and </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">9.4.1.8</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Cause the policies, processes and procedures used by Supplier to interface with Kraft to provide the Services and the reports, user interfaces, and deliverables or
outputs of the Services that are&nbsp;made available to Kraft to be in conformance with the generally accepted practices of the Information Technology Infrastructure Library (&#147;<B>ITIL</B>&#148;) by the Commencement Date, except as otherwise
required in the applicable Supplement or as otherwise agreed upon by the Parties. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>9.4.2</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B></B>Supplier shall submit such processes, procedures and controls for any changes made or new functions introduced by Supplier to Kraft for its review, comment and
approval within 60 days after the Effective Date and shall use commercially reasonable efforts to finalize such processes, procedures and controls and obtain Kraft&#146;s final approval within 60 days after the Effective Date. Where Supplier is
required to document any processes, procedures and controls of Kraft existing as of the Effective Date, Supplier shall provide that documentation to Kraft for its review, comment and approval within 120 days after the Effective Date. Upon
Kraft&#146;s approval, such processes and procedures shall be included in the Policy and Procedures Manual. Prior to the approval of such processes and procedures by Kraft, Supplier shall adhere strictly to Kraft&#146;s then current policies
procedures, and controls. No failure or inability of the quality assurance procedures to disclose any errors or problems with the Services shall excuse Supplier&#146;s failure to comply with the Service Levels and other terms of this Agreement.
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:18px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>9.5</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Processes, Procedures, Architecture, Standards and Planning</B>. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>9.5.1</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Supplier Support</B>. As requested by Kraft, Supplier shall assist Kraft on an on-going basis in defining (A)&nbsp;information technology and other
standards, policies, practices, processes, </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">59 </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT HAS BEEN REQUESTED FOR PORTIONS OF THIS EXHIBIT. THE COPY FILED HEREWITH OMITS THE INFORMATION SUBJECT TO A
CONFIDENTIALITY REQUEST. OMISSIONS ARE DESIGNATED [ * * * ]. A COMPLETE VERSION OF THIS EXHIBIT HAS BEEN FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION. </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
procedures and controls to be adhered to and enforced by Supplier in the performance of the Services; and (B)&nbsp;the associated IT technologies architectures, standards, products and systems to
be provided, operated, managed, supported and/or used by Supplier in connection therewith (collectively, the &#147;<B>Kraft Standards</B>&#148;). As of the Effective Date, the Kraft Standards include the standards set forth on <B><U>Schedule
8</U></B>. Supplier also shall assist Kraft on an annual basis or otherwise as requested by Kraft in preparing Strategic Plans and short-term implementation plans. The assistance to be provided by Supplier shall include: (i)&nbsp;active
participation with Kraft representatives on permanent and ad-hoc committees and working groups addressing such issues; (ii)&nbsp;assessments of the then-current Kraft Standards at a level of detail sufficient to permit Kraft to make informed
business decisions; (iii)&nbsp;analyses of the appropriate direction for such Kraft Standards in light of business priorities, business strategies, competitive market forces, and changes in technology; (iv)&nbsp;the provision of information to Kraft
regarding Supplier&#146;s technology, business processes and telecommunications strategies for its own business that Supplier generally makes available to its customers; and (v)&nbsp;recommendations regarding standards, processes, procedures and
controls and associated technology architectures, standards, products and systems. With respect to each recommendation, Supplier shall provide the following at a level of detail sufficient to permit Kraft to make an informed business decision:
(i)&nbsp;the projected cost to Kraft and the Eligible Recipients and cost/benefit analyses; (ii)&nbsp;the changes, if any, in the personnel and other resources Supplier, Kraft and/or the Eligible Recipients will require to operate and support the
changed environment; (iii)&nbsp;the resulting impact on the total costs of Kraft and the Eligible Recipients; (iv)&nbsp;the expected performance, quality, responsiveness, efficiency, reliability, security risks and other service levels; and
(v)&nbsp;general plans and projected time schedules for development and implementation. Any assistance provided by [ * * * ] under [ * * * ] or [ * * * ], [ * * * ], or [ * * * ] (except as otherwise provided in [ * * * ]) shall be at no [ * * * ]
beyond the [ * * * ] specified in [ * * * ] for the Services, unless an [ * * * ] has been approved by [ * * * ]. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>9.5.2</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Supplier Familiarity with Kraft Standards</B>. Supplier is fully informed as to the Kraft Standards as of the Commencement Date, including through due diligence and
its hiring of the Transitioned Employees, to the extent such Kraft Standards have been made available to Supplier. Supplier shall be responsible for including in the applicable Policy and Procedures Manual in accordance with
<B><U>Section&nbsp;9.1</U></B> the Kraft Standards delivered to Supplier in writing prior to the Effective Date and indicated as such. Additions, deletions or modifications to the Kraft Standards shall be communicated in writing by Kraft to
Supplier. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>9.5.3</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Kraft Authority and Supplier Compliance</B>. Kraft shall have final authority to promulgate Kraft Standards and Strategic Plans and to modify or grant waivers from
such Kraft Standards and Strategic Plans. Supplier shall (i)&nbsp;comply with and implement the Kraft Standards and Strategic Plans in providing the Services, (ii)&nbsp;work with Kraft to enforce the Kraft Standards and Strategic Plans,
(iii)&nbsp;modify the Services as and to the extent necessary and to a schedule to conform to such Kraft Standards and Strategic Plans, and (iv)&nbsp;obtain Kraft&#146;s prior written approval for any deviations from such Kraft Standards and
Strategic Plans. Notwithstanding the requirements in this Agreement regarding Supplier&#146;s compliance with the Kraft Standards, Kraft acknowledges that Supplier&#146;s shared service Systems, which Supplier uses to provide services to both Kraft
and Supplier&#146;s other customers, will not be required to be in compliance with the Kraft Standards, provided that such Systems must still meet the requirements set forth in <B><U>Sections 13.2</U></B> and <B><U>15.11.1</U></B>, and must
otherwise be sufficient to enable Supplier to meet its other obligations under this Agreement. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">60 </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT HAS BEEN REQUESTED FOR PORTIONS OF THIS EXHIBIT. THE COPY FILED HEREWITH OMITS THE INFORMATION SUBJECT TO A
CONFIDENTIALITY REQUEST. OMISSIONS ARE DESIGNATED [ * * * ]. A COMPLETE VERSION OF THIS EXHIBIT HAS BEEN FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION. </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>9.5.4</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Financial, Forecasting and Budgeting Support</B>. To support Kraft&#146;s forecasting and budgeting processes, Supplier shall provide the following processes
information regarding the costs to be incurred by Kraft and/or the Eligible Recipients in connection with the Services and the cost/benefit to Kraft and/or the Eligible Recipients associated therewith: (i)&nbsp;actual and forecasted utilization of
Resource Units; (ii)&nbsp;actual and forecasted changes in the total cost or resource utilization of Kraft and the Eligible Recipients associated with changes to the environment; (iii)&nbsp;opportunities to modify or improve the Services, to reduce
the Charges, Pass-Through Expenses or retained expenses incurred by Kraft; and (iv)&nbsp;such other information as Kraft may reasonably request. Such information shall be provided at Kraft&#146;s request and in accordance with the schedule
established by Kraft. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>9.5.5</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Technology Plan</B>. Supplier shall develop and implement a technology and business process plan that is consistent with the Kraft Standards and Strategic Plan and
that shows how Supplier will provide the Services to enable Kraft to achieve the Strategic Plan objectives and to implement and support Kraft&#146;s business, information technology objectives and strategies (&#147;<B>Technology Plan</B>&#148;). The
development of the Technology Plan will be an iterative process that Supplier shall carry out in consultation with Kraft. The timetable for finalization of the Technology Plan shall be set each year having regard to the timetable for the Strategic
Plan. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">9.5.5.1</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Process</B>. The process for developing and approving the Technology Plan shall be as follows. Supplier shall provide a draft Technology Plan each year that includes
multi-year implementation plans to achieve multi-year objectives. Kraft shall review the draft Technology Plan and provide requested amendments. Supplier shall incorporate any such amendments, unless it reasonably believes that any requested
amendment would not assist Kraft to achieve its objectives and strategies. Kraft and Supplier shall escalate any disagreements about requested amendments to the draft Technology Plan in accordance with the dispute resolution procedure in
<B><U>Article 19</U></B>. Following approval by Kraft, the draft Technology Plan will replace the previous plan. Approval of the Technology Plan by Kraft shall not relieve Supplier of any obligation under this Agreement in relation to its provision
of the Services. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">9.5.5.2</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Contents</B>. In the Technology Plan, Supplier shall, among other things, include plans for: (A)&nbsp;refreshing Equipment and Software (consistent with the refresh
cycles defined in defined in this Agreement, its Schedules, or the applicable Supplement); (B)&nbsp;adopting new technologies and business processes as part of the Technology Evolution of the Services, as defined in this Agreement; and
(C)&nbsp;maintaining flexibility as described in <B><U>Section&nbsp;9.17</U></B>. In the Technology Plan, Supplier shall also present a reasonably detailed implementation plan for the upcoming year, and a high level implementation plan for
subsequent years, in each case for the achievement of the Strategic Plan and the Kraft Standards. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">9.5.5.3</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Compliance</B>. Supplier shall comply with the Technology Plan at all times, unless Kraft agrees to depart from the Technology Plan. Any such agreement to depart
from the Technology Plan from the date on which it is signed by Kraft will not relieve Supplier of its responsibilities under the previous plan prior to the date of such agreement. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">61 </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT HAS BEEN REQUESTED FOR PORTIONS OF THIS EXHIBIT. THE COPY FILED HEREWITH OMITS THE INFORMATION SUBJECT TO A
CONFIDENTIALITY REQUEST. OMISSIONS ARE DESIGNATED [ * * * ]. A COMPLETE VERSION OF THIS EXHIBIT HAS BEEN FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION. </FONT></P>

<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>9.6</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Change Control. </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>9.6.1</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Compliance with Change Control Procedures</B>. If Supplier desires or is required to make any change in the information technology or other standards, processes,
procedures and controls or associated IT technologies, architectures, standards, products, Software, Equipment, Systems, Services or Materials provided, operated, managed, supported or used in connection with the Services, Supplier shall comply with
the change control procedures specified in the Policy and Procedures Manual (&#147;<B>Change Control Procedures</B>&#148;). The Policy and Procedures Manual shall contain a procedure that allows Kraft to exercise the approval rights in this Section
and complies with the following requirements: </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">9.6.1.1</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Impact Assessment</B>. If Supplier desires or is required to make any change, upgrade, replacement or addition that may have an adverse impact or require changes as
described in <B><U>Section&nbsp;9.6.3</U></B> or increase the risk of Supplier not being able to provide the Services in accordance with this Agreement or violate or be inconsistent with Kraft Standards or Strategic Plans, then Supplier shall
prepare a written risk assessment and mitigation plan: (i)&nbsp;describing in detail the nature and extent of such adverse impact or risk; (ii)&nbsp;describing any benefits, savings or risks to Kraft or the Eligible Recipients associated with such
change; and (iii)&nbsp;proposing strategies to mitigate any adverse risks or impacts associated with such change and, after consultation and agreement with Kraft, implement the plan. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">9.6.1.2</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Comparison Testing</B>. Each time that Supplier makes a material change (more than, for instance, routine maintenance or like for like changes in the environment) to
the Software, Equipment, Systems, Services or Materials Supplier shall perform a comparison test at a reasonable and mutually agreed level of detail to ensure the change will not have an adverse impact on the costs, business, or environment of Kraft
or an Eligible Recipient or on the functionality interoperability, performance, accuracy, speed, legality, responsiveness, quality or resource efficiency of, the Services. In addition, at Kraft&#146;s request, Supplier shall perform a comparison at
a reasonable and mutually agreed level of detail, between the amount of Resource Units required to perform a representative sample of the Services being performed for Kraft and the Eligible Recipients immediately prior to the change and immediately
after the change. Kraft shall not be required to pay for increased Resource Unit usage due to a change except to the extent that such change is requested or approved by Kraft after notice from Supplier of such increased Resource Unit usage.
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="9%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">9.6.1.3</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Prior to making any change or using any new (e.g., not tested in or for the Kraft environment) Software, Equipment or System to provide the Services, Supplier shall
have verified by appropriate testing that the change or item has been properly installed, is operating in accordance with its specifications, is performing its intended functions in a reliable manner and is compatible with and capable of operating
as part of the Kraft environment. This obligation shall be in addition to any unit testing done by Supplier as part of routine deployment or installation of Software or Equipment. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>9.6.2</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Financial Responsibility for Changes</B>. Unless otherwise set forth in this Agreement, including as specified in <B><U>Schedule 11.1</U></B>,<B>
<U>12.1 </U></B>or <B><U>12.3</U></B> or the applicable Supplement, or approved in </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">62 </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT HAS BEEN REQUESTED FOR PORTIONS OF THIS EXHIBIT. THE COPY FILED HEREWITH OMITS THE INFORMATION SUBJECT TO A
CONFIDENTIALITY REQUEST. OMISSIONS ARE DESIGNATED [ * * * ]. A COMPLETE VERSION OF THIS EXHIBIT HAS BEEN FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION. </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
accordance with <B><U>Section&nbsp;9.6.3</U></B> or otherwise, Supplier shall bear all charges, fees and costs associated with any change desired by Supplier, including all charges, fees and
costs associated with (i)&nbsp;the design, installation, implementation, testing and rollout of such change, (ii)&nbsp;any modification or enhancement to, or substitution for, any impacted business process or associated Software, Equipment, System,
Services or Materials, (iii)&nbsp;any increase in the cost to Kraft or the Eligible Recipients of operating, maintaining or supporting any impacted business process or associated Software, Equipment, System, Services or Materials, and
(iv)&nbsp;subject to <B><U>Section&nbsp;9.6.8</U></B>, any increase in Resource Unit usage resulting from such change. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>9.6.3</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Kraft Approval &#150; Cost, Adverse Impact</B>. Supplier shall make no change which will (i)&nbsp;increase Kraft&#146;s total cost of receiving the Services;
(ii)&nbsp;require material changes to, or have an adverse impact on, Kraft&#146;s or an Eligible Recipient&#146;s business, operations, facilities, business processes, systems, software, utilities, tools or equipment (including those provided,
managed, operated, supported and/or used on their behalf by Kraft Third Party Contractors); (iii)&nbsp;require Kraft or the Eligible Recipients, at their expense, to install a new version, release, upgrade of, or replacement for, any Software or
Equipment or to modify any Software or Equipment; (iv)&nbsp;have a material adverse impact on the functionality, interoperability, performance, accuracy, speed, responsiveness, quality or resource efficiency of the Services; (v)&nbsp;have an adverse
impact on any Applications run by Kraft or the Eligible Recipients; (vi)&nbsp;have an adverse impact on Supplier&#146;s ability to adequately deliver the Services; (vii)&nbsp;have an adverse impact on the cost, either actual or planned, to Kraft of
terminating all or any part of the Services or exercising its right to in-source or use third parties; (viii)&nbsp;have an adverse impact on Kraft&#146;s or an Eligible Recipient's environment (including its flexibility to deal with future changes,
interoperability and its stability); (ix)&nbsp;introduce new technology to Kraft&#146;s or an Eligible Recipient&#146;s environment or business, to the extent that such introduction has or may have an impact on Kraft&#146;s or an Eligible
Recipient&#146;s environment; (x)&nbsp;have an adverse impact on the functionality, interoperability, performance, accuracy, speed, responsiveness, quality, cost or resource efficiency of Kraft&#146;s Retained Systems and Business Processes; or
(xi)&nbsp;violate or be inconsistent with Kraft Standards or Strategic Plans as specified in <B><U>Section&nbsp;9.5</U></B>, without first obtaining Kraft&#146;s approval, which approval Kraft may withhold in its sole discretion. If Supplier desires
to make such a change, it shall provide to Kraft a written proposal describing in detail the extent to which the desired change may affect the functionality, performance, price or resource efficiency of the Services and any benefits, savings or
risks to Kraft or the Eligible Recipients associated with such change. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>9.6.4</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Information for Exercise of Strategic Authority</B>. In order to facilitate Kraft&#146;s strategic control pursuant to <B><U>Section&nbsp;9.5</U></B>, Supplier will
provide Kraft with such information as Kraft shall reasonably require prior to making any proposed change. Such information shall include, at a minimum, a description of the proposed rights of Kraft and the Eligible Recipients with respect to
ownership and licensing (including any related restrictions) relating to such Software, Equipment or other technology or Materials. Such description shall include the license fees, maintenance fees and/or purchase or lease terms (if any) for use of
such Software, Equipment or other technology or Materials by Kraft, the Eligible Recipients and their respective third party contractors upon termination or expiration of the Term and any limitations or conditions on such use.
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>9.6.5</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Temporary Emergency Changes</B>. Notwithstanding the foregoing, Supplier may make temporary changes required by an emergency if it has been unable
to contact the Kraft Contract Manager or his or her designee to obtain approval after making reasonable efforts. Supplier shall document and report such emergency changes to Kraft not later than the next business day after
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
